text:
For Local HubL to support custom modules (v2) as they are in the FTP format 
-  meta.json
-  fields.json
- module.css
- module.html
- module.js

mainly just for easier development locally, iâ€™m all for creating the fields etc within HubSpot at first to generate ids but maybe this could be an extension after the initial idea with checks to see locally created custom modules have unique IDs so a custom module can be created locally, thoughts?
I think honestly meta and fields.json could probably even be 1 file.

There really needs to be a way to export directly from the template editor for local hubl server. I really want to use it but it's pretty painful to set up. Being able to just push/pull from FTP would be a good start.

would be nice if there was a bulk swap templates -which worked for both pages and staged pages.

The process would need to show previews of every page before it went live with an option to cancel or revert individual pages to prevent  breaking things.

Add in an ALT text field in the file manager so we can add a global alt text to all images. The allow the ability to override this text from the page level when adding in images.  Would make it easier for when using this in the IMAGE HubDB column so we can pull in proper alt text for each image.
